samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript combo box control shows the default rendering of the combo box component with minimum configuration.

samples.name: Grouping and Icons
samples.description: This demo shows the grouping based on different categories with individual header and icon support in the Syncfusion JavaScript combo box control.

samples.name: Data Binding
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript combo box control shows how to bind with  local data source and how to fetch data from remote data service.

samples.name: Custom Value
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript combo box control demonstrates the addition of a new value that is not present in the predefined list.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: This demo explains on how to customize the appearance of each item in the pop-up list using template option in  Syncfusion JavaScript combo box control.

samples.name: Filtering
samples.description: This demo explains the filtering functionalities of the  Syncfusion JavaScript combo box control.

samples.name: Cascading
samples.description: This demo for Syncfusion JavaScript combo box control shows the cascading support.

samples.name: Diacritics Filtering
samples.description: This demo explains the diacritics filter functionality of the Syncfusion JavaScript combo box control.
